reviewText:
This was not sent to me--I received a silent Douglas Fairbanks DVD No sound, no color--a real SILENT FILM. Not what I ordered
I ordered a Film with Gene Kelly as a Three Muskatere

Approximately 1/3 of the way through, the disc began skipping and then quit playback. Turned the player off then on then skipped a chapter ahead, but it automatically skipped another chapter before it began playing again. I know the film itself is very good, just wish I could watch all of it
DVD stopped (hung) in 2 places.  My payment was quickly refunded.  No problem.
